alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:13PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Little River, northwestern Sevier and southern McCurtain Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Broken Bow, or 17 miles west of De Queen, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Queen, Horatio, Idabel, Broken Bow, Millerton, Haworth, Garvin, Eagletown, Bokhoma, Moon, Cerrogordo, Goodwater, Shinewell, Holly Creek, Glover, America, West Line, Oak Hill, Golden, and West Otis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
